{

         "NDJC:APP_LABEL": "德州餐厅",
         "NDJC:HOME_TITLE": "德州餐厅",
         "NDJC:PRIMARY_BUTTON_TEXT": "上传照片",
         "NDJC:THEME_NAME": "德州风格",
         "NDJC:DARK_MODE": "false",

         "NDJC:FONT_FAMILY_SECONDARY": "Times New Roman",
         "NDJC:I18N_ENABLED": "true",

         "NDJC:DEBUG_LOG_ENABLED": "true",
         "NDJC:LOG_LEVEL": "DEBUG",
         "NDJC:CRASHLYTICS_ENABLED": "true",
         "NDJC:EXPERIMENT_BUCKET": "https://example.com/experiment",
         "THEME_COLORS": "#FF0000,#00FF00,#0000FF",
         "TYPOCASE_OVERRIDES": "{'title': 'uppercase', 'description': 'lowercase'}",
         "STRINGS_EXTRA": "{'upload': '上传照片', 'edit': '编辑文字', 'price': '价格', 'comment': '评论', 'like': '点赞'}",
         "ROUTE_HOME": "/home",
         "ROUTE_DETAIL": "/detail"
      },
      "block": {
         "HOME_HEADER": "德州餐厅",
         "HOME_BODY": "上传照片、编辑文字介绍、设定价格、评论点赞",
         "HOME_ACTIONS": "上传照片、编辑文字介绍、设定价格、评论点赞",
         "SPLASH_CONTENT": "欢迎使用德州餐厅",
         "EMPTY_STATE": "暂无数据",
         "ERROR_STATE": "发生错误",
         "DEBUG_PANEL": "调试面板",
         "HEADER_AD_SLOT": "广告位",
         "USER_PROFILE_CARD": "用户资料",
         "SPONSORED_CARD": "赞助商",
         "PROFILE_SECTION": "用户资料",
         "SETTINGS_SECTION": "设置",
         "SETTINGS_SECTION:EXTRA": "更多设置"
      },
      "list": {
         "ROUTES": [
            "/home",
            "/detail"
         ],
         "DEPENDENCY_SNIPPETS": [
            "com.example.dtxc:dependency:1.0"
         ],
         "PROGUARD_EXTRA": [
            "-keep class com.example.dtxc.** { *; }"
         ],
         "PACKAGING_RULES": [
            "com.example.dtxc:packaging:1.0"
         ],
         "POST_FIELDS": [
            "title",
            "description",
            "price",
            "comment",
            "like"
         ],
         "PLURAL_STRINGS": [
            "{'upload': '上传照片', 'edit': '编辑文字', 'price': '价格', 'comment': '评论', 'like': '点赞'}"

            "com.example.dtxc:style:1.0"
         ],
         "DEEPLINK_PATTERNS": [
            "https://example.com/deeplink"
         ],
         "NETWORK_CLEAR_TEXT": [
            "https://example.com/network"
         ],
         "RES_CONFIGS_OVERRIDE": [
            "com.example.dtxc:res:1.0"
         ]
      },
      "if": {
         "NAV_TRANSITIONS": true,
         "BUILD_SUMMARY": true,
         "NATIVE_SPLITS": true,
         "AFTER_BUILD": true,
         "PRE_COMMIT": true,
         "AFTER_INSTALL": true,
         "BEFORE_BUILD": true,
         "POST_INJECT": true,

      "hook": {

      },
      "gradle": {
         "applicationId": "com.example.dtxc",
         "resConfigs": [
            "en"
         ],
         "permissions": [

         ]
      }
